name: Atlantic Clipper 2D2N
description: Embark on an unforgettable adventure aboard the Atlantic Clipper, a lively mega yacht perfect for fun-loving adventurers aged 18 to 35. This tour offers a unique blend of excitement and relaxation, featuring thrilling water activities, including snorkeling, scuba diving, and two exhilarating waterslides. With a heated spa, air-conditioned cabins, and fresh meals prepared onboard, guests can enjoy both comfort and adventure. Ideal for social travelers, this tour is a fantastic opportunity to explore the stunning Whitsundays with new friends.

name: New Horizon 2D2N
description: Experience the ultimate adventure aboard New Horizon, a 69ft authentic sailing boat designed for young travelers aged 18-35. This tour offers an exhilarating mix of activities, from snorkeling and scuba diving in the Great Barrier Reef Marine Park to enjoying onboard fun with a mega inflatable slide and paddleboards. Whether you're diving into the clear waters or relaxing on deck, New Horizon promises a unique and unforgettable journey through the stunning Whitsunday Islands. Ideal for thrill-seekers and social adventurers, this tour also includes an exclusive after-party at Mama Africa's Nightclub to keep the excitement going.

name: Providence V
description: Experience the Whitsundays aboard the Providence V, a charming tall ship that offers an authentic sailing adventure. This tour is perfect for those seeking a blend of history, adventure, and relaxation. Sail to the iconic Whitehaven Beach, snorkel in crystal-clear waters, and enjoy a full day on the water. With its rich history as a replica of the American Blackfish and a star in a Hollywood movie, Providence V provides a unique sailing experience. Ideal for families, couples, and anyone eager to explore the Whitsundays in style.
includes:
Snorkel equipment
Delicious lunch options available
Full day on the water
Visit to Betty's Beach
Marine Park fees and National Park fees
Stinger suits (summer months only)
Courtesy transfers to/from select local accommodations
Coffee and tea
highlights:
Authentic tall ship sailing experience
Sail to the world-famous Whitehaven Beach
Snorkel, swim, and relax
Feast on a delicious lunch
Built from timber from the Tully Rainforest
Starred in a Hollywood movie
Charming and historical vessel

name: Apollo 3D2N
description: Embark on a thrilling adventure aboard Apollo, a fully refitted 75ft Maxi yacht with a rich racing history. This 3-day, 2-night tour offers a unique opportunity to explore the stunning Whitsunday Islands. Perfect for those seeking a fun and social experience, this tour combines authentic sailing with the chance to snorkel in vibrant coral reefs and visit iconic locations like Whitehaven Beach and Hill Inlet. Enjoy freshly prepared meals onboard and soak up the sun with a group of like-minded travelers.
departure_times: Departs 9:00am Thu, Sun | Returns 4:00pm Sat, Tues
includes:
Up to 26 fun-loving guests for a sociable experience
Freshly onboard prepared meals
Snorkelling gear and wetsuit hire
Fresh linen for each guest
BYO drinks & alcohol
Filtered water station
Marine Park fees and taxes
highlights:
Authentic sailing experience on a world-class Maxi yacht
Visit to Whitehaven Beach and Hill Inlet
Snorkeling in coral reefs with diverse marine life
Experienced crew showcasing island highlights
Social atmosphere with games and activities
Fully refitted yacht with modern amenities
price_tiers: Adult - Hot Deal - Shared Accom (08 Dec 2025 - 28 Feb 2026): A$699 | Adult - Shared Accom (01 Oct 2025 - 30 Apr 2026): A$739
itinerary:
**Day 1:**
This incredible experience begins bright and early, with guests able to check in at Coral Sea Marina from 8:00 AM, ready for a 9.30 AM departure. Our first port of call is the wondrous Stonehaven Bay with a stop via Langford Reef. Enjoy an incredibly authentic sailing experience on a world-class sailing boat with an extensive racing history. Your experienced and passionate crew will guide you through the day.
**Day 2:**
After rising early, Apollo will set sail for Tongue Bay where you'll spend the day exploring Whitehaven Beach. Boasting 7 kilometres of pristine and dazzling white silica sand, you’ll get to laze about, explore, sunbathe and bush walk to your heart’s content. Afterwards, enjoy a leisurely walk to Hill Inlet, where you’ll witness one of the most incredible views in the area. After your walk, you’ll board Apollo again and set sail for another cozy anchorage site for the evening. Get ready for a fun night ahead with games, socialising and an incredible atmosphere!
menu:
**Our Delicious Sample Menu**
Your trip aboard Apollo is accompanied by a divine menu, prepared fresh onboard from local ingredients. Check out Apollo's sample menu for an idea of the food that awaits! BYO alcohol.
ideal_for: Young adults and the young at heart seeking adventure and social engagement in a stunning natural setting.

name: Kiana Outer Reef Expedition 5D4N
description: Embark on a unique five-day adventure with the Kiana Outer Reef Expedition, where luxury meets exploration. This tour offers an intimate experience with only 8 guests, providing a personalized and enchanting journey through the Whitsunday Islands. Ideal for divers and snorkelers, this tour allows you to explore the vibrant marine life and stunning corals of the Outer Great Barrier Reef. Perfect for those looking to slow down and truly connect with the natural beauty of the reef and islands.
